CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 22, 1958, page 42, reads: "At Convalescent Home - Relaxing under the keen eyes of Supervisor Louise C. Smith of Terrace House is Miss Jennie Reid, a patient at the Harriet Tubman Guild's convalescent home. There will be a board meeting at 11 A. M., Feb. 24; an open session for the public at 2 P. M., and a supper session at 6 P. M., celebrating the Harriet Tubman anniversary. All sessions will be held at Jerusalem Baptist Church, West End. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Jennie Reid wearing plaid dress, seated in rocking chair with thermometer in mouth, with Louise C. Smith wearing nurse uniform taking pulse, in interior of the Harriet Tubman Terrace House for Convalescent Women and Girls with three beds on wheels, and decorative fireplace on right
